flawed_nl_solution:
One third as many adults as children is 45/3=<<45/3=51>>51 adults.
One third of adults wore blue, or 51/3=<<51/3=17>>17 adults wore blue.
Thus, the remaining 51-17=<<51-17=34>>34 adults did not wear blue
#### 34

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
